articles.title: Bernie Sanders Blasts Trump and Musk During Surprise Coachella Appearance - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: In an unannounced cameo before a massive crowd, the Vermont senator urged young people to take action against the administration: “The future of what happens in America is dependent on your generation.”
articles.content:
The star-studded line-up at the Coachellamusic festival included an unexpected guest on Saturday night.
